dcterms:creator: R. F. Pereira
M. L. Dias
C. M. de Sá Medeiros
P. P. Rebouças Filho
dcterms:description: A dataset containing goat leather samples with various defects, used for classification purposes utilizing computer vision and machine learning techniques.
dcterms:title: Leather Defect Dataset (Tick-Bite Defects)

dcterms:creator: S. Winiarti
A. Prahara
D. P. I. Murinto
dcterms:description: A dataset of approximately 3000 leather sample images from five types of leather, used for classification through a pre-trained convolutional neural network.
dcterms:title: Leather Sample Images

dcterms:creator: S. T. Liong
Y. S. Gan
Y. C. Huang
C. A. Yuan
H. C. Chang
dcterms:description: A dataset used for automatic defect segmentation on leather samples, focusing on tick-bite defects, employing deep learning techniques.
dcterms:title: Leather Images for Defect Segmentation

dcterms:creator: W. P. Amorim
M. C. Pistori
H. Pereira
M. A. C. Jacinto
dcterms:description: A dataset for leather defect classification, utilizing attribute reduction methods to enhance classification performance.
dcterms:title: Leather Defect Classification Dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Georgieva
K. Krastev
N. Angelov
dcterms:description: A dataset for identifying surface leather defects, focusing on the use of chi-squared distance for defect detection.
dcterms:title: Leather Defect Identification Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Branca
M. Tafuri
G. Attolico
A. Distante
dcterms:description: A dataset for automated detection and classification of leather defects, utilizing Gaussian filters and neural networks.
dcterms:title: Automated Leather Defect Detection Dataset
